  • 2023

    Here it comes, rising over Roc Roi.

    More fun with Defenders.

    Papa and Pau went to Barcelona to pick up Noah and Caleb. We had a big sandwich in Agramunt.

    Pau is ten! We went to La Taverna.

    Xavi and Gina were there too.

    We went to the Bosc de Viros to see the meteorite shower.

    We went hiking with Xavi and Gemma and Pol and Gina.

    Caleb doesnâ€™t seem to like being in photos.

    We almost hit a baby deer driving back from Toulouse.

    Back at the raft, with Saoirse and Rebecca.

    At the sheep fair with Gina.

    Saoirseâ€™s bicycle and this motorbike.

    We have been painting stones and making bracelets and selling them in the market place!

    Noah and Caleb have come to visit and they brought chocolate from Ireland.

    Itâ€™s time to move on from the strider bike.

    Sometimes at the bass we hang out in the raft.

    Every year the carnival comes to town once or twice and this is one of their campers. If Papa was designing a camper van it would look like this. Itâ€™s very Tom Waits.

    We found this little baby bird injured and took her home. We called her Alberta.

    We found these two really old bicycles in the gully behind the house, bound together by a tree that has grown up through them. The are probably from the civil war era.

    We will try to preserve them in some way, maybe display them on a wall.

    BoÃ­ and Fionn built this tower.

    Everybody went biking in Guingueta.

    Monkeys on bars.

    Some videos of the correfoc.

    Ash and Ollie and Oscar and Fionn came to visit.

    There was a lot of cycling.

    We also went to the Festa Major.

    And there was lots of relaxing.

    Lots more photos.

    Dave Tec and Kim Siekerman and Lara came to visit.

    Fire festival in LlavorsÃ­.

    We are getting ready for the Womenâ€™s World Cup 2023, which is being held in Australia and New Zealand.

    Riu took some portraits when we were at the refugi.

    We went hiking with Pol and Gina and Donnacha to the refuge J.M. Blanc in the AigÃ¼estortes National Park.
